explains: n. 漩涡，涡流；混乱，纷乱

sentences.en: Some rooms also have fireplace, whirlpool bath and wet bar.
sentences.cn: 一些房间也有壁炉、漩涡浴盆和带水槽的吧台。

sentences.en: The recent rain had churned up the waterfall into a muddy whirlpool.
sentences.cn: 近来的雨水把那条瀑布搅成了泥水漩涡。

sentences.en: The whirlpool sucked down the boat.
